lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps left the Olympic pool for the last time on Saturday having fulfilled a childhood dream, but it is clear he will not be walking away from the sport that has turned him into a global household name.

headline.main: Phelps Leaves Olympic Pool but Not the Sport
headline.print_headline: Phelps Leaves Olympic Pool but Not the Sport

snippet: Michael Phelps left the Olympic pool for the last time on Saturday having fulfilled a childhood dream, but it is clear he will not be walking away from the sport that has turned him into a global household name....
